data.meanings: To lie, say what is not a fact, lie to falsely invent, tell lies about or against, fabricate a lie, relate a lie, say a falsehood, be wrong, be cut off, deceive, disappoint the expectation of.
data.sentence: The word وَكَذَّبَ comes from the root ك ذ ب and is associated with the meanings: To lie, say what is not a fact, lie to falsely invent, tell lies about or against, fabricate a lie, relate a lie, say a falsehood, be wrong, be cut off, deceive, disappoint the expectation of.

data.meanings: To be handsome, make good, seem good or beautiful, be excellent.
data.sentence: The word بِالْحُسْنَى comes from the root ح س ن and is associated with the meanings: To be handsome, make good, seem good or beautiful, be excellent.
